vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐλεφάντ-ῐνος, η, ον,
of ivory, [Refs 7th c.BC+]; δίφρος ἐ.,= Latin sella curulis, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; οἶκοι ἐ. [LXX]; τὸ ἐ. the substance of ivory, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 white as ivory, μέτωπον [Refs]; τάριχος Crates 29.
vocabInfos.shortDef: made of ivory (derivative of the Greek word for "elephant," not found in the NT)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
made of ivory (derivative of the Greek word for "elephant," not found in the NT)
ivory, made of ivory, Rev. 18:12*
